sentences.en: a comparatively small number of people
Beating on the naked body was a comparatively light punishment.
sentences.cn: 剥光衣服来毒打,已经是相对比较轻的刑罚.

sentences.en: Comparatively few books have been written on the subject.
sentences.cn: 有关这方面的书相对较少。

sentences.en: Comparatively speaking, this part of the coast is still unspoiled.
sentences.cn: 相对而言，这一段海岸尚未遭到破坏。

sentences.en: Crime on the island is comparatively rare .
sentences.cn: 这个岛上犯罪活动相对较少。

sentences.en: Even this comparatively simple separation can yield a lot of useful information.
sentences.cn: 就是用这种相对简单的分离方法,也能获得大量有用的信息.

sentences.en: He gave up high - stake card games and stayed comparatively sober.
sentences.cn: 他戒掉的高赌注的牌戏,喝酒也比较有节制了.

sentences.en: He was comparatively calm and concentrated in judging how to defeat his opponent.
sentences.cn: 他相对冷静沉着,聚精会神地判断如何打败对手.

sentences.en: His intelligence is comparatively favourable with that of his brother.
sentences.cn: 他的智力相对地比他哥哥强.

sentences.en: Mispronunciation of this word is comparatively rare.
sentences.cn: 把此字发音读错的人较少.

sentences.en: She has been comparatively successful in maintaining her privacy.
sentences.cn: 在保护自己的隐私方面她一直都做得比较成功。

sentences.en: She was then still comparatively unknown.
sentences.cn: 她那时候还不怎么出名.

sentences.en: The life of the troops was still comparatively austere.
sentences.cn: 军队的生活还是相对清苦的。

sentences.en: The minister appealed to the Cabinet not to target her comparatively tiny budget of ￡4 billion.
sentences.cn: 那位部长呼吁内阁不要以她40亿英镑这样相对小额的预算为批评目标.

sentences.en: The past few days have seemed comparatively flat and empty.
sentences.cn: 过去这几天似乎比较平淡无聊。

sentences.en: The situation was still comparatively calm there, he reported.
sentences.cn: 他报告说:那里的局势还比较平静.

sentences.en: The unit is comparatively easy to install and cheap to operate.
sentences.cn: 这种设备比较容易安装而且用起来便宜。

sentences.en: Tin is a comparatively easy metal to smelt.
sentences.cn: 锡是比较容易熔化的金属.

words.tran_cn: 比较；对照；比喻；比较关系

trans.tran_cn: 对比地，相对地，比较地，有点
trans.tran_en: as compared to something else or to a previous state
